byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and JULIA WERDIGIER

abstract: On Friday, California's two huge public sector pension funds said they would withhold support from some or all of the News Corporation's board nominees.
snippet: On Friday, California's two huge public sector pension funds said they would withhold support from some or all of the News Corporation's board nominees.
lead_paragraph: A week before the News Corporation's annual shareholder meeting, the company is facing a growing chorus of investors rallying against company leadership after a phone-hacking scandal in Britain and a controversy this week over an unorthodox circulation arrangement in Europe.

headline.main: Pension Funds Challenge News Corporation Board
